tab_container.label: Firestorm Prefs
tab_container.name: tabs

check_box.label: Play avatar animations (such as shouting)
check_box.name: play_avatar_animations
FSIMSystemMessageBrackets
check_box.label: Wrap system chat messages in brackets (V1 style chat headers only)

check_box.name: FSChatHistoryShowYou
check_box.label: Show "You" in chat transcript instead of your name

check_box.name: EmotesUseItalic
check_box.label: Emotes use italic font

check_box.name: FSEmphasizeShoutWhisper
check_box.label: Bold shouting, Italicize whispering

check_box.name: FSMarkObjects
check_box.label: Mark objects with (no name) when they speak to avoid spoofing
Route llOwnerSay to script debug window
check_box.name: FSllOwnerSayToScriptDebugWindow_checkbox

check_box.label: Show chat in bubbles above avatars
check_box.name: bubble_text_chat

check_box.label: Don't show chat in Nearby Chat console and toasts
check_box.name: FSBubblesHideConsoleAndToasts

check_box.label: Show typing indicator in bubbles above avatars
check_box.name: bubble_text_typing

check_box.label: Show typing indicator in nametag above avatars
check_box.name: FSShowTypingStateInNameTag
FSSecondsinChatTimestamps
check_box.label: Show seconds in timestamps [HH:MM:SS]
Nearby Chat
check_box.name: show_timestamps_nearby_chat

check_box.label: IMs
check_box.name: show_timestamps_im

check_box.label: Transcript
check_box.name: show_timestamps_transcripts

check_box.label: Show on-screen chat console
check_box.tool_tip: Show/Hide the chat console text, when the Conversations window is not displayed
check_box.name: FSShowOnscreenConsole
FSConsoleClassicDrawMode
check_box.label: Use classic draw mode for console
check_box.tool_tip: Classic draw mode renders the console background as single block over all lines with width of the longest line.

check_box.name: ChatFullWidth
check_box.label: Use full width of screen for console

check_box.name: IMShowNamesForP2PConv
check_box.label: Show names in direct IMs
Use V1 style chat headers
check_box.name: plain_text_chat_history

check_box.label: When using [SHORT_VIEWER_GENERATION] style chat headers, show mini icons
check_box.name: ShowChatMiniIcons

check_box.label: Show the end of last conversation
check_box.name: LogShowHistory
FSTypingChevronPrefix
check_box.label: Add additional chevron (>) as typing indicator to IM sessions

check_box.name: FSNotifyUnreadChatMessages
check_box.label: Nearby chat
check_box.tool_tip: Shows a notification with the number of new unread messages in the nearby chat window if new messages arrive while the view is scrolled back to read the chat history.

check_box.name: FSNotifyUnreadIMMessages
check_box.label: Instant and group messages
check_box.tool_tip: Shows a notification with the number of new unread messages in the instant/group message window if new messages arrive while the view is scrolled back to read the chat history.

radio_group.name: chat_window
radio_group.tool_tip: Show your Instant Messages in separate floaters, or in one floater with many tabs (Requires restart)

radio_group.name: chat_tab_direction
radio_group.tool_tip: Change flow of the chat/IM tabs between horizontal and vertical when consolidated tab mode is active. (Requires restart)

check_box.name: FSHighlightGroupMods
check_box.label: Enable group moderator message highlighting

check_box.name: FSMuteAllGroups
check_box.label: Disable ALL group chats

check_box.name: FSMuteGroupWhenNoticesDisabled
check_box.label: When 'Receive group notices' is disabled, disable group chat as well

check_box.name: FSIgnoreAdHocSessions
check_box.label: Automatically ignore and leave all conference (ad-hoc) chats

check_box.name: FSReportIgnoredAdHocSession
check_box.label: Report ignored conference chats in nearby chat

check_box.name: FSDontIgnoreAdHocFromFriends
check_box.label: Don't ignore conference chats invitations from my friends

text.name: group_snooze_time_label
text.tool_tip: Amount of time a group chat will be muted when pressing the "Snooze" button. Setting a value of 0 will effectively just close the window until the next group message arrives.

spinner.name: GroupSnoozeTime
spinner.tool_tip: Amount of time a group chat will be muted when pressing the "Snooze" button. Setting a value of 0 will effectively just close the window until the next group message arrives.

text.name: group_snooze_time_seconds_label
text.tool_tip: Amount of time a group chat will be muted when pressing the "Snooze" button. Setting a value of 0 will effectively just close the window until the next group message arrives.

check_box.name: FSEnablePerGroupSnoozeDuration
check_box.label: Set group chat snooze duration individually per group
Play typing animation when chatting
check_box.name: play_typing_animation

check_box.label: Play typing animation also when emoting
check_box.name: play_typing_animation_emote

check_box.label: Hear typing sound when people type in nearby chat
check_box.name: play_typing_sound

check_box.label: Send typing notifications to other avatars during IM sessions
check_box.name: FSSendTypingState
FSChatbarGestureAutoCompleteEnable
check_box.label: Enable auto-completion of gestures in nearby chat bar

check_box.name: FSChatbarNamePrediction
check_box.label: Enable automatic name prediction in nearby chat bar

check_box.name: AllowMUpose
check_box.label: ":" as a synonym for "/me"

check_box.name: AutoCloseOOC
check_box.label: Auto-close ((OOC)) parentheses

check_box.name: FSEnableEmojiWindowPopupWhileTyping
check_box.label: Enable automatic emoji picker window while typing in chat bars

check_box.name: FSShowEmojiButton
check_box.label: Show emoji button in chat bar for IM sessions and Nearby Chat

check_box.name: FSShowIMSendButton
check_box.label: Show send chat button in chat bar for IM sessions

check_box.name: FSNearbyChatbar
check_box.label: Add a chat bar in the Nearby Chat window

check_box.name: FSShowChatChannel
check_box.label: Show channel selection in chat bar

check_box.name: FSShowChatType
check_box.label: Show chat type / send chat button in chat bar
Autohide main chatbar
check_box.name: AutohideChatBar
check_box.tool_tip: Hide the chat bar from the bottom button bar and only show it as an overlay when needed.

check_box.label: Deselect chat after sending a message
check_box.name: CloseChatOnReturn

check_box.label: De-focus chat history as well
check_box.name: FSUnfocusChatHistoryOnReturn
FSUseCtrlShout
check_box.label: Ctrl+Enter (Shout)
check_box.tool_tip: Enable this if you would like to use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Enter to Shout in Nearby Chat.

check_box.name: FSUseShiftWhisper
check_box.label: Shift+Enter (Whisper)
check_box.tool_tip: Enable this if you would like to use the keyboard shortcut Shift+Enter to Whisper in Nearby Chat

check_box.name: FSUseAltOOC
check_box.label: Alt+Enter ((OOC))
check_box.tool_tip: Enable this if you would like to use the keyboard shortcut Alt+Enter to send ((OOC)) messages to Nearby Chat.

panel.label: Notices
panel.name: ChatNotices

check_box.name: EnableGroupChatPopups
check_box.label: Group Chats
check_box.tool_tip: Check to see popups when a Group Chat message arrives

check_box.name: EnableIMChatPopups
check_box.label: IM Chats
check_box.tool_tip: Check to see popups when an instant message arrives

check_box.name: FSUseNearbyChatConsole
check_box.label: Use console for chat popups instead of floating toasts (Viewer 1.x style)

check_box.name: FSLogImToChatConsole
check_box.label: Show IMs in chat console

check_box.name: FSLogGroupImToChatConsole
check_box.label: Show group chat in chat console

panel.text: Length of group name to be printed in chat transcript

spinner.tool_tip: -1 for full group name, 0 for disabled
spinner.name: FSShowGroupNameLength

check_box.name: FSOpenIMContainerOnOfflineMessage
check_box.label: Open Conversations when an offline message has been received

check_box.name: FSRestoreOpenIMs
check_box.label: Restore conversations with residents from previous session
Email me IMs when I'm offline ([EMAIL])
check_box.name: send_im_to_email

panel.text: [https://accounts.secondlife.com/change_email Open email notification settings for offline IMs]
Login to change offline IMs to Email settings

check_box.name: FSShowIMInChatHistory
check_box.label: Show IMs and Group Chat in Nearby Chat Window

check_box.name: FSLogIMInChatHistory
check_box.label: Save IMs and Group Chat in Nearby Chat

panel.text: Fade IM text into the background of the chat transcript window

spinner.tool_tip: 0.25-1.0, 0.25 for a lot of fade, 1 for no fade
spinner.name: FSIMChatHistoryFade

check_box.name: FSShowMessageCountInWindowTitle
check_box.label: Show number of unread IMs in Firestorm's window title

check_box.name: FSAnnounceIncomingIM
check_box.label: Announce incoming IMs as soon as the sender starts typing

check_box.name: FSIMChatFlashOnFriendStatusChange
check_box.label: Flash IM tabs when friends come online or go offline

check_box.name: FSNotifyNearbyChatFlash
check_box.label: Flash chat toolbar button if new nearby chat arrives
check_box.tool_tip: Flashes the chat toolbar button if a new nearby chat arrives. The nearby chat window must be docked to the conversations window and the conversations window must be closed for the button to flash.

check_box.name: FSNotifyIMFlash
check_box.label: Flash chat toolbar button if a new IM arrives
check_box.tool_tip: Flashes the chat toolbar button if a new (group) IM arrives. The IM window must be docked to the conversations window and the conversations window must be closed for the button to flash. This option is only available if IMs will be shown in tabs instead of separate windows (see "General" tab).

check_box.name: FSReportMutedGroupChat
check_box.label: Report muted group chat in nearby chat

check_box.name: FSGroupNoticesToIMLog
check_box.label: Show group notices in group chats, in addition to toasts

check_box.name: FSBetterGroupNoticesToIMLog
check_box.label: Show their subjects and authors as well

check_box.name: reportChatRangeEnter
check_box.label: Radar reports when avatars enter chat range

check_box.name: PlayModeUISndRadarChatEnter
check_box.label: Play sound UUID:

check_box.name: reportChatRangeLeave
check_box.label: Radar reports when avatars leave chat range

check_box.name: PlayModeUISndRadarChatLeave
check_box.label: Play sound UUID:

check_box.name: reportDrawRangeEnter
check_box.label: Radar reports when avatars enter draw distance

check_box.name: PlayModeUISndRadarDrawEnter
check_box.label: Play sound UUID:

check_box.name: reportDrawRangeLeaave
check_box.label: Radar reports when avatars leave draw distance

check_box.name: PlayModeUISndRadarDrawLeave
check_box.label: Play sound UUID:

check_box.name: RadarReportSimRangeEnter
check_box.label: Radar reports when avatars enter the region

check_box.name: PlayModeUISndRadarSimEnter
check_box.label: Play sound UUID:

check_box.name: RadarReportSimRangeLeave
check_box.label: Radar reports when avatars leave the region

check_box.name: PlayModeUISndRadarSimLeave
check_box.label: Play sound UUID:

check_box.name: RadarEnterChannelAlert
check_box.label: Report enter alerts to scripts

check_box.name: RadarLeaveChannelAlert
check_box.label: Report exit alerts to scripts

check_box.name: FSRadarEnhanceByBridge
check_box.label: Enhance Radar with LSL-Client Bridge
check_box.tool_tip: If this is enabled, radar functions responsible for determining avatar locations at high altitudes are assisted by the LSL-Client Bridge, particularly when they're beyond draw distance.

spinner.name: RadarAvatarAgeAlertValue
spinner.tool_tip: Also colors the age column in the radar. Set to -1 to disable.

check_box.name: RadarAvatarAgeAlert
check_box.label: Radar reports avatars younger than the specified age

check_box.name: PlayModeUISndRadarAgeAlert
check_box.label: Play sound UUID:

check_box.name: FSKeywordOn
check_box.label: Enable Keyword Alerts

check_box.name: FSKeywordInChat
check_box.label: Look for Keywords In Nearby Chat

check_box.name: FSKeywordInIM
check_box.label: Look for Keywords In IMs and Group Chat

check_box.name: FSKeywordSpeakersName
check_box.label: Check sender's name for keywords

check_box.name: FSKeywordCaseSensitive
check_box.label: All Keywords are case-sensitive

check_box.name: FSKeywordMatchWholeWords
check_box.label: Only match whole words

check_box.name: FSKeywordChangeColor
check_box.label: Enable Color Alert

check_box.name: FSKeywordPlaySound
check_box.label: Play alert sound

tab_container.panel:
.
Calc. expressions (usage: cmd SIN(2+2))
Change Draw Dist (usage: cmd meters)
Max. Bandwidth (usage: cmd kbps)
Copy camera position to clipboard
Turn AO on/off (usage: cmd on/off)
Clear the chat transcript (usage: cmd)
Set the media url (usage: cmd url type)
Set the music stream url (usage: cmd url)
Rez a platform (usage: cmd 0 - 64)
Get avatar name from key (usage: cmd key)
Roll dice (usage: cmd dice faces mt mv)
Teleport within region (usage: cmd x y z)
Teleport to ground (usage: cmd)
Teleport to altitude (usage: cmd z)
Teleport to cam position (usage: cmd)
Offer teleport to avatar (usage: cmd key)
Teleport to avatar (usage: cmd name)
Teleport home (usage: cmd)
Teleport to region (usage: cmd regionname | x y z)
